title: Adamant axe

properties.value: An adamant axe is a one-handed axe requiring 30 Attack to wield and 31 Woodcutting to use to cut trees. Making one requires 1 adamant bar and 71 Smithing, yielding 62.5 Smithing experience. As with all axes, it can be used to cut trees even when in the players inventory.

Item ID1357

An adamant axe is a one-handed axe requiring 30 Attack to wield and 31 Woodcutting to use to cut trees. Making one requires 1 adamant bar and 71 Smithing, yielding 62.5 Smithing experience. As with all axes, it can be used to cut trees even when in the players inventory.

The log chopping success rate is 300% better than a bronze axe and 20% better than a mithril axe.

It is bought from Perry's Chop-chop Shop for 4,096.

[[File:Adamant axe detail.png|left|130px]]
An '''adamant axe''' is a one-handed [[axe]] requiring 30 [[Attack]] to wield and 31 [[Woodcutting]] to use to cut [[trees]]. Making one requires 1 [[adamant bar]] and 71 [[Smithing]], yielding 62.5 Smithing [[experience]]. As with all axes, it can be used to cut trees even when in the players inventory.

The log chopping success rate is 300% better than a [[bronze axe]] and 20% better than a [[mithril axe]].

It is bought from [[Perry's Chop-chop Shop]] for {{Coins|4096}}.
